short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the chat welcome message on Twitch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When using an unstable connection or some VPNs, twitch's chat service will reconnect, triggering a new "Welcome to the chat!" message each time. This can result in welcome message spam in the chat. This plugin hides these messages as they appear.
